images.caption: Figure 1:Overview of ReSurgSAM2. The model begins with the text-referred target detection using CSTMamba to provide credible frames for selection using CIFS. Upon detecting the initial frame, CIFS activates the tracking stage, in which DLM offers diverse and reliable memory for consistent long-term tracking.
Figure 2:Qualitative comparison in Ref-EndoVis17(left) and Ref-EndoVis18(right).
